xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 23 May 2014
xwikidoc.content: <mcupak> has quit 12:08 <mcupak> has quit 17:09 <akats> has joined #phenotips 17:10 <akats> For the last issue with the All Data table, the records do appear in the all data page, correct? 17:10 <akats> Just not the all data page 17:11 <sdumitriu> No 17:11 <sdumitriu> That's the same thing 17:11 <sdumitriu> There's only one "All data" 17:12 <sdumitriu> That one is mine 17:12 <sdumitriu> (the issue) 17:16 <akats> oh ok 17:26 <akats> In the export, right now, metadata is exported like this Cataract; Congenital onset; Nonprogressive disorder 17:27 <akats> Would it make sense to export this with split cells 17:27 <akats> Cataract in one cell and the metadata in the next 17:27 <sdumitriu> Yes 17:27 <sdumitriu> If 17:27 <sdumitriu> Each term is on a separate row 17:27 <sdumitriu> Otherwise you don't know which metadata corresponds to which term 17:28 <akats> makes sense 17:28 <akats> some bottom borders would be useful too 17:29 <sdumitriu> Yes 17:30 <sdumitriu> For each patient, not for each phenotype 17:30 <akats> ok 18:59 <akats> has quit 21:15 <vijay13> has quit
